values: A fuss is excited or annoyed behavior that is not useful in any way.
The child made an awful fuss because she didn’t want to go to bed.
n. 大惊小怪，大惊小怪的人；小题大作；忙乱 vt. 使烦恼，使烦忧 vi. 小题大作；忙乱；焦燥；焦急；无事自扰
